faqs.question: What are the known issues with Blender 4.2?
faqs.answer: [warning]Blender 4.2 Stability Issues|There are significant crash issues with Blender 4.2. If you experience crashes, please downgrade to Blender 4.1 as a temporary solution.[/warning]

faqs.question: What issues exist with the Merge Armature feature?
faqs.answer:
[info]There are currently some unresolved issues with the Merge Armatures feature. Since these issues are difficult to reproduce consistently, we recommend:[/info]

• Try different versions of Blender
• Test with different CATS plugin versions

[note]We are actively investigating these issues and will update when solutions are found.[/note]

faqs.question: What are the known Material Combiner plugin issues and solutions?
faqs.answer:
[details]Atlas Generation Issues|When clicking "Save atlas to.." and experiencing problems:

1. Texture Packaging:
   • Save your .blend file
   • Go to File > External data > Unpack All Into Files

2. Language Issues:
   • Blender must be in English
   • Node names are language-sensitive
   • Either rename nodes manually or switch Blender to English

3. Shader Compatibility:
   • Check supported shaders in [link]https://github.com/Grim-es/material-combiner-addon/blob/master/utils/materials.py|utils/materials.py[/link][/details]

[details]Pillow Installation Issues|If Pillow installation keeps repeating:
• Disable any active VPN
• Avoid Windows Store version of Blender[/details]

[note]Support Note: For Material Combiner issues, please report them [link]https://github.com/Grim-es/material-combiner-addon/issues|here[/link]. While we embed the UI, Material Combiner is a separate plugin from CATS.[/note]
